evidence.claim: Pager utilizes AWS for cloud services, ensuring scalability and security.
Their platform is designed to be HIPAA compliant, handling patient data securely.
Pager's API supports FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
They implement HL7 V2 protocols for effective health data communication.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 or clearinghouse use cases found on their site.
